Job Description

The Data Scientist role is a key position in the Data Science team. Primary focus is on data mining&database development, data analysis&correlation development, scenario design&test, statistical trends, regressions, and forecasting.

The role includes, but is not limited to the following duties:
  • Perform special market research and other projects as assigned with focus on mathematical modeling and data analysis
  • Find, track, analyze, and communicate global economic data and trends impacting Albemarle business areas/products, both current and future
  • Use data to create models that depict trends in the customer base and market dynamics
  • Work with GBU/Divisional leadership to outline the specific data needs for each business and determine core analytics to be provided to manage business effectively
  • Facilitate and champion a data-driven decision culture
Education:

BS in Business, Mathematics, Engineering or Science related discipline.

MS/PhD preferred.

Experience:
  • 10 years data analytics experience
  • Chemical industry experience preferred
  • Experience in Lithium/Energy Storage portfolio preferred
